Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    teetime.framework.A2InvalidThreadAssignmentCheck
    since 3.0. Use A2InvalidThreadAssignmentCheck instead.
    teetime.framework.AbstractSynchedPipe
    since 3.0. Use AbstractSynchedPipe instead.
    teetime.framework.AbstractUnsynchedPipe
    since 3.0. Use AbstractUnsynchedPipe instead.
    teetime.stage.basic.distributor.strategy.BlockingRoundRobinStrategy
    since 3.0. Use BlockingBusyWaitingRoundRobinDistributorStrategy instead.
    teetime.stage.basic.merger.strategy.BusyWaitingRoundRobinStrategy
    since 3.0. Use BlockingBusyWaitingRoundRobinMergerStrategy instead.
    teetime.framework.ConfigurationContext
    since 3.0. Scheduled to be remove in 3.1 or above without replacement.
    teetime.stage.basic.merger.dynamic.CreatePortAction
    since 3.0. Use CreatePortActionMerger instead.
    teetime.stage.basic.distributor.dynamic.CreatePortAction
    since 3.0. Use CreatePortActionDistributor instead.
    teetime.stage.ObjectProducer
    since 3.0. Use StreamProducer instead.
    teetime.stage.basic.merger.strategy.RoundRobinStrategy
    since 3.0. Use NonBlockingFiniteRoundRobinStrategy instead.
    teetime.stage.taskfarm.TaskFarmStage
    since 3.0. Use StaticTaskFarmStage instead.
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    teetime.framework.TerminationStrategy
    since 3.0. We will completely remove framework-backed support for infinite producers since it has never worked correctly in all (corner) cases. Instead, please use finite producers and implement an appropriate termination condition by your own.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    teetime.stage.InstanceOfFilter.getOutputPort()
    Since 1.1. Use InstanceOfFilter.getMatchedOutputPort() instead.
    teetime.framework.AbstractStage.getTerminationStrategy()
    since 3.0. We will completely remove framework-backed support for infinite producers since it has never worked correctly in all (corner) cases. Instead, please use finite producers and implement an appropriate termination condition by your own.
    teetime.framework.AbstractProducerStage.getTerminationStrategy()
    since 3.0. We will completely remove framework-backed support for infinite producers since it has never worked correctly in all (corner) cases. Instead, please use finite producers and implement an appropriate termination condition by your own.
    teetime.framework.StageFacade.getTerminationStrategy(AbstractStage)
    since 3.0. Will be removed.
    teetime.framework.test.StageTester.receive(List<O>)
    since 3.0. Use the following code instead: 
     
 import static StageTester.*;
 ...
 assertThat(stage.getOutputPort(), produces(1,2,3));
    teetime.framework.Configuration.registerCustomPipe(AbstractPipe<?>)
    since 3.0. Use Configuration.connectPorts(OutputPort, InputPort, IPipeFactory) instead.
    teetime.framework.pipe.IPipe.reportNewElement()
    since 3.0. Is removed without replacement.
    teetime.framework.pipe.AbstractSynchedPipe.reportNewElement()
    since 3.0. Is removed without replacement.
    teetime.framework.AbstractStage.terminateStage()
    since 3.0. Use AbstractStage.workCompleted() instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    teetime.stage.Clock()
    since 3.0. Use Clock.Clock(TerminationCondition) instead.
    teetime.framework.Configuration(AbstractExceptionListenerFactory<?>, ConfigurationContext)
    since 3.0. Scheduled to be removed in 3.1 or above. Use Configuration.Configuration(AbstractExceptionListenerFactory) instead.
    teetime.stage.MD5Stage(String)
    As of 3.0. Use {MD5Stage.MD5Stage(Charset) instead.
